rules.description: Stoopid remaps so command + 0 goes to first safari/brave tab and command + 1 goes to first desktop space
Command + . closes downloads bar in Brave
ctrl + w behaves everywhere like vim
copy + say date with shift + f9

to.shell_command:
date '+%-m/%-d/%-y' | tr -d '
' | pbcopy && date '+%-m/%-d/%Y' | xargs say

rules.description: open Apple Notes with shift + command + m
open all apps with ctrl + shift + o
Shifts Move Forward and Backward by 1 word
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
vowel + t/n/s at same time for accents
